languages.text: "Вы ведь знаете, что хранителей станции было двое. Ваша догадка абсолютно верна — Теобальд Орселлио, безумный старик, что помешался на леди Кассии и ее силе, повинен в бедах Эурак-V и нашего Дома".

traits.locale_text: "Вы ведь знаете, что хранителей станции было двое. Ваша догадка абсолютно верна — Теобальд Орселлио, безумный старик, что помешался на леди Кассии и ее силе, повинен в бедах Эурака и нашего Дома".

languages.text: "As I'm sure you are aware, there were two Keepers of the Station. Your guess is absolutely correct — Theobald Orsellio, the demented old man obsessed with Lady Cassia and her power. And also the one to blame for the woes that have befallen Eurac V and our noble line."
languages.original_text: "Вы ведь знаете, что хранителей станции было двое. Ваша догадка абсолютно верна — Теобальд Орселлио, безумный старик, что помешался на леди Кассии и ее силе, повинен в бедах Эурак-V и нашего Дома".

traits.locale_text: "You must be aware our station had two wardens. Your guess is absolutely correct, it is Theobald Orsellio, the demented old man obsessed with Lady Cassia and her power who is to blame for the woes that have befallen Eurac-V and our noble line."

"You must be aware our station had two wardens. Your guess is absolutely correct, it is Theobald Orsellio, the demented old man obsessed with Lady Cassia and her power who is to blame for the woes that have befallen Eurac-V and our noble line."

"As I'm sure you are aware, there were two Keepers of the Station. Your guess is absolutely correct — Theobald Orsellio, the demented old man obsessed with Lady Cassia and her power. And also the one to blame for the woes that have befallen Eurac-V and our noble line."

"As I'm sure you are aware, there were two Keepers of the Station. Your guess is absolutely correct — Theobald Orsellio, the demented old man obsessed with Lady Cassia and her power. And also the one to blame for the woes that have befallen Eurac V and our noble line."

"As I'm sure you are aware, there were two Keepers of the Station. Your guess is absolutely correct — Theobald Orsellio, the demented old man obsessed with Lady Cassia and her power. And also the one to blame for the woes that have befallen Eurac V and our noble line."

"As I'm sure you are aware, there were two Keepers of the Station. Your guess is absolutely correct — Theobald Orsellio, the demented old man obsessed with Lady Cassia and her power. And also the one to blame for the woes that have befallen Eurac V and our noble line."

languages.text: «Como seguro que ya sabe, la estación tenía dos guardias. Estaba completamente en lo cierto respecto a su suposición: Theobald Orsellio, el anciano desequilibrado obsesionado con Lady Cassia y su poder; y también el responsable de los males que han caído sobre Eurac V y nuestra noble dinastía».
languages.original_text: "As I'm sure you are aware, there were two Keepers of the Station. Your guess is absolutely correct — Theobald Orsellio, the demented old man obsessed with Lady Cassia and her power. And also the one to blame for the woes that have befallen Eurac V and our noble line."

traits.locale_text: «Como seguro que ya sabe, la estación tenía dos guardias. Estaba completamente en lo cierto respecto a su suposición: Theobald Orsellio, el anciano desequilibrado obsesionado con Lady Cassia y su poder; y también el responsable de los males que han caído sobre Eurac V y nuestra noble dinastía».

languages.text: "Wie Ihr sicher wisst, gab es zwei Hüter der Station. Ihr habt vollkommen richtig geraten — Theobald Orsellio, der senile alte Mann, der von Lady Cassia und ihrer Macht besessen ist. Und auch der Mann, der für das Leid verantwortlich ist, das Eurac V und unsere Adelslinie befallen ist."
languages.original_text: "As I'm sure you are aware, there were two Keepers of the Station. Your guess is absolutely correct — Theobald Orsellio, the demented old man obsessed with Lady Cassia and her power. And also the one to blame for the woes that have befallen Eurac V and our noble line."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr sicher wisst, gab es zwei Hüter der Station. Ihr habt vollkommen richtig geraten — Theobald Orsellio, der senile alte Mann, der von Lady Cassia und ihrer Macht besessen ist. Und auch der Mann, der für das Leid verantwortlich ist, das Eurac V und unsere Adelslinie befallen ist."

languages.text: « Comme vous le savez sans doute, la station avait deux gardiens. Mais vous avez vu juste : Théobald Orsellio est un vieux fou obsédé par dame Cassia et son pouvoir. Et il est aussi la cause des ennuis que connaissent Eurac-V et notre noble lignée. »
languages.original_text: "As I'm sure you are aware, there were two Keepers of the Station. Your guess is absolutely correct — Theobald Orsellio, the demented old man obsessed with Lady Cassia and her power. And also the one to blame for the woes that have befallen Eurac V and our noble line."

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous le savez sans doute, la station avait deux gardiens. Mais vous avez vu juste : Théobald Orsellio est un vieux fou obsédé par dame Cassia et son pouvoir. Et il est aussi la cause des ennuis que connaissent Eurac-V et notre noble lignée. »

languages.text: “我相信您肯定已经发现了，这座星站有两位守护者。您的猜测完全正确，这场叛乱的罪魁祸首是西奥巴德·奥赛罗，也就是那个痴迷于卡西娅女士与她的力量的疯老头。是他为欧拉克五号星站与我们的导航宗族带来了不幸。”
languages.original_text: "As I'm sure you are aware, there were two Keepers of the Station. Your guess is absolutely correct — Theobald Orsellio, the demented old man obsessed with Lady Cassia and her power. And also the one to blame for the woes that have befallen Eurac V and our noble line."

traits.locale_text: “我相信您肯定已经发现了，这座星站有两位守护者。您的猜测完全正确，这场叛乱的罪魁祸首是西奥巴德·奥塞罗，也就是那个痴迷于卡西娅女士与她的力量的疯老头。是他为欧拉克五号星与我们的导航宗族带来了不幸。”

languages.text: 「ご存知かと思うが、ステーションには保持者が二人いた。あなたの推測は大当たりだ。シオボールド・オーセリオ、カシア様とその御力に取り憑かれた頭のおかしい老いぼれです。そして、ユーラック・Vと我らが高貴なる一門に降りかかった悲劇の元凶でもある」
languages.original_text: "As I'm sure you are aware, there were two Keepers of the Station. Your guess is absolutely correct — Theobald Orsellio, the demented old man obsessed with Lady Cassia and her power. And also the one to blame for the woes that have befallen Eurac V and our noble line."

traits.locale_text: 「ご存知かと思うが、ステーションには管理人が二人いた。あなたの推測は大正解だ。テオバルト・オーセリオ、カシア様とその御力に取り憑かれた頭のおかしい老いぼれさ。そして、ユーラック・Vと我々貴族一族に降りかかった悲劇の元凶でもある」
「ご存知かと思うが、ステーションには保持者が二人いた。あなたの推測は大当たりだ。シオボールド・オーセリオ、カシア様とその御力に取り憑かれた頭のおかしい老いぼれです。そして、ユーラック・Vと我らが高貴なる一門に降りかかった悲劇の元凶でもある」

languages.text: "Senin de bildiğin üzere istasyonumuzun iki Sorumlusu vardı. Çok doğru söylüyorsun. Bu saydıklarının hepsi, Leydi Cassia ve gücüyle kafayı bozmuş bunak Theobald Orsellio'nun marifeti. Eurac V ve asil sülalemizin başına gelenlerin suçlusu da o."
languages.original_text: "As I'm sure you are aware, there were two Keepers of the Station. Your guess is absolutely correct — Theobald Orsellio, the demented old man obsessed with Lady Cassia and her power. And also the one to blame for the woes that have befallen Eurac V and our noble line."

traits.locale_text: "Senin de bildiğin üzere istasyonumuzun iki Sorumlusu vardı. Çok doğru söylüyorsun. Bu saydıklarının hepsi, Leydi Cassia ve gücüyle kafayı bozmuş bunak Theobald Orsellio'nun marifeti. Eurac V ve asil sülalemizin başına gelenlerin suçlusu da o."
